title: Smart Talks with IBM and Malcolm Gladwell: How 5G, Edge Computing and AI are Transforming Industries
itunes:title: Smart Talks with IBM and Malcolm Gladwell: How 5G, Edge Computing and AI are Transforming Industries
description:
As one of the nation’s largest wireless communication providers, over 120 million subscribers count on Verizon to stay connected, but we’re not just talking about phones. Today, Verizon and IBM are working together to better connect entire industries. In this episode of Smart Talks, Malcolm talks to Srini Kalapala VP, Global Technology, Strategy and Network Cloud at Verizon and Steve Canepa, Global GM & Managing Director of IBM’s Communications Sector about how 5G, Edge Computing and AI will reshape the way work gets done.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
